Dosage.title: Dosage
Dosage.description: The value and unit of the Dosage, Concentration or Capacity.

numericValue.title: Numeric Value
numericValue.description: The numeric value of the Dosage. It can be a range of numbers, e.g. '10-25'.

unit.title: Unit
unit.description: The unit of measurement of the Dosage, from the unitDosage codelist.

Container.title: Container
Container.description: The container or presentation form of the medicine.

ActiveIngredient.title: Active Ingredient
ActiveIngredient.description: Describe an Active Ingredient and dosage for the drug, generally chemical compounds and / or biological substances.

name.title: Active Ingredient Name
name.description: The name of the Active Ingredient. It refers to the generic name as in the International Common Denomination (INN). This field is the same as the 'name' attribute in the ATC / DDD standard. Also known as: generic name, drug, substance name, active substance.

dosage.title: Active Ingredient Dosage
dosage.description: The dosage or potency of the Active Ingredient.

activeIngredients.title: Active Ingredients
activeIngredients.description: An array of Active Ingredients for the medicine, generally chemical compounds and / or biological substances.

dosageForm.title: Dosage Form
dosageForm.description: A dosage form in which this medicine is available, from the dosageForm codelist.

administrationRoute.title: Administration Route
administrationRoute.description: A route by which this medicine can be given, from the administrationRoute codelist.

container.title: Container
container.description: The container or presentation form of the medicine, from the container codelist.
